summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to their chiefs, forwarding discovery requests from defense counsel in the Epstein case and seeking to discuss proposed responses. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery exchanges in early 2020.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Defense counsel who submitted discovery requests to the government, as indicated by the attached file named 'Michael_Thomas_-_Discovery_Request.pdf'.

events.title: Government Letter from Defense Counsel
events.description: Defense counsel sent a letter to the government, referenced in the attachment 'Response_to_1-24-20_letter_from_the_Government.pdf'.

events.title: Discovery Request Forwarding
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards defense counsel's discovery requests to their chiefs to discuss proposed responses.

keyFacts: The document is an internal government email dated February 10, 2020, regarding discovery in the Epstein case.
Defense counsel Michael Thomas submitted discovery requests to the government, which were forwarded for discussion.
The email references a prior letter from the government dated January 24, 2020, to which a response was being prepared.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery exchanges in the Epstein case in early 2020.
